dashboard.title: Dashboard
dashboard.content: Welcome to the dashboard. Here, you can see an overview of your candidates, missions, and recent activities.
dashboard.tip1: Use advanced search to quickly find candidates or missions.
dashboard.tip2: Change language using the selector in the header.
dashboard.tip3: Check the statistics to analyze your recruitment activity.

candidate_list.title: Candidates List
candidate_list.content: This page displays all your candidates. You can filter, sort, and search among them.
candidate_list.tip1: Filter candidates by sector, function, or status.
candidate_list.tip2: Click on a row to view candidate details.
candidate_list.tip3: Add a new candidate with the '+ New Candidate' button.

candidate_form.title: Candidate Form
candidate_form.content: Use this form to add or edit candidate information.
candidate_form.tip1: All fields marked with an asterisk (*) are required.
candidate_form.tip2: Add tags to categorize your candidates.
candidate_form.tip3: You can attach a resume or relevant documents.

candidate_detail.title: Candidate Details
candidate_detail.content: This page displays detailed information about a candidate as well as their interaction history.
candidate_detail.tip2: Schedule interviews or events in the 'Interactions' section.
candidate_detail.tip3: Associate the candidate with missions using the 'Missions' section.

mission_list.title: Missions List
mission_list.content: This page displays all your recruitment missions. You can filter, sort, and search among them.
mission_list.tip1: Filter missions by client, sector, or status.
mission_list.tip2: Click on a row to view mission details.
mission_list.tip3: Add a new mission with the '+ New Mission' button.

mission_form.title: Mission Form
mission_form.content: Use this form to create or edit a recruitment mission.
mission_form.tip1: Clearly define needs and criteria to facilitate candidate search.
mission_form.tip2: Add custom recruitment steps for this mission.
mission_form.tip3: You can associate existing candidates directly from this form.

mission_detail.title: Mission Details
mission_detail.content: This page displays detailed information about a mission as well as associated candidates.
mission_detail.tip2: Add candidates to this mission using the 'Add Candidate' button.
mission_detail.tip3: Track candidate progress through the different stages of the process.
